javadoc: The SubDataFieldLocation class contains specific location information within the Sub-data field of a CodeUnitLocation object.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: path
params.comment:
path associated with the address (an address could
 appear at more than one group path); may be null

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
array of indexes for each nested data component;
 the index is the data component's index within its parent; may be null

params.name: refAddr
params.comment:
the "referred to" address if the location is
 over a reference; may be null

params.name: rep
params.comment: the String representation of the operand.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the character position within the operand string.

params.name: fieldName
params.comment: the name of the sub-data field

methods.javadoc: Should only be used by XML restoration.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Should only be used by XML restoration.

methods.javadoc: Returns a string representation of the dataValue at this location.
methods.name: getDataRepresentation
methods.comment: Returns a string representation of the dataValue at this location.

methods.javadoc: Returns the name of the sub-data field.
methods.name: getFieldName
methods.comment: Returns the name of the sub-data field.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.

name: SubDataFieldLocation
comment:
The SubDataFieldLocation class contains specific location information
 within the Sub-data field of a CodeUnitLocation object.
